contentrichtext.text: '''Labour Representation Committee''' may refer to: * [[British Labour Party#Labour Representation Committee|Labour Representation Committee]], the original name of the British Labour Party * [[Labour Representation Committee (2004)]], a 21st century pressure group within the British Labour Party {{disambig}} [[Category:Political parties established in 1900]] [[Category:Socialist parties in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Labour Party (UK)]] [[Category:Social Democratic Federation]]
